message: Take it or leave it! 90% for me, 10% for you. Don't wait too long, the money is worth less with each passing round!
I propose an equal split, 500,000 for each of us. This ensures fairness and avoids the risk of inflation affecting our shares.
You rejected the 50/50 split, so I'm offering 70% for me and 30% for you. Take it or leave it, the money is getting scarcer!
